TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content:
> 
> Whatever the universe or timeline, that guy seems to be always in need of a rescue.

Awesome! If he's anything like my Tedus he'll be highly survivable, but there is no such thing as a "resusable" spaceplane if he's driving.

Bill and Jeb to Val:

![7ec.png](http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/547/525/7ec.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-24T01:58:05Z" title="10/24/2015 01:58  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 24, 2015</time> by Sanic**

> 
> Bill and Jeb to Val:
> [http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/547/525/7ec.png](http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/547/525/7ec.png)

Seriously? Is that the only thing on your crtl+c?!?!?!?!

> 
> Seriously? Is that the only thing on your crtl+c?!?!?!?!

It's just a good meme.

I think Kuzzter and Parkaboy are competing for the biggest cliffhanger...

So just a hunch here...

In the next chapter, Jeb et al manage somehow to save the whole planet, and his "punishment" is to be busted down to Majer. (And go back to flying missions.)

> 
> So just a hunch here...
> In the next chapter, Jeb et al manage somehow to save the whole planet, and his "punishment" is to be busted down to Majer. (And go back to flying missions.)

That would follow the Trek sequence pretty well, wouldn't it? But no, he's got a couple of ranks to go before he's in any danger of getting chained to a desk. Right now he's only a Looty Kernel and they fly all the time IRL.

Bill can always join the KSMC, I'm sure they'll accept him after that rocket car surface docking on Eve.

Rep rep rep rep rep rep rep rep!

Wonderful! Fantastic!

Loved the build up to the reveal.

I also got a very good laugh from Walt's quip. Thanks!

Happy landings!

ETA: And I'll definitely rep GregroxMun the next time I see him.

But without kerbals how are you going to repair wheels, pack parachutes, do KAS/KIS stuff, and extraplanetary launchpads? (btw anyone knows a mod that has probecores that can build stuff for epl?)?

Dammit Mortimer.
Admiral Shirley....

Stop calling me Shirl ... oh ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Well, I think it is quite obvious where this is going. Like someone suggested some pages ago, Kerbfleet is ( unlike, say , NASA ) a military enterprise and the military decided to put some brakes on our hungry-for-funds and most definitely not a military Kerb Mortimer ... they still need a place to keep Jeb out of the Air Force, after all ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

P.S Just a question , though: why the navy? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-25T18:04:36Z" title="10/25/2015 06:04  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 25, 2015</time> by r\_rolo1**
Was Shirley mentioned on this comic before? *Shirley* my memory isn't decieving me! (But seriously was she mentioned before?)

> 
> Was Shirley mentioned on this comic before? *Shirley* my memory isn't decieving me! (But seriously was she mentioned before?)

Why, yes, she was. Check out [this post](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128879-Eve-Order-Zero-a-KSP-Graphic-Novel-%28Int3-pg4-They-re-not-exactly-on-a-first-name-basis-%29?p=2178721&viewfull=1#post2178721).

Happy landings!
Come on I already want 35 million more pages! The comments to pages ratio is getting too onesided.

> 
> ...and I'd like to invite the amazing GregroxMun to drop a post here explaining how he did it, so that everyone can rep the heck out of him for Admiral Shirley's awesome uniform! Thanks, Gregrox!

Explanation:

Step one: Take the blue "science" IVA suit out from my Multicolor Suits Pack.

Step two: Change it to a darker blue.

Step three: Use the copy/paste paintbrush to remove the flight suit greeble and straps (replacing it with the suit's own wrinkles).

Step four: Take the white leg area from the stock EVA suit and paste that on the bottom as well.

Step five: find a picture of Admiral Nelson.

Step six: Copy/paste the medals onto it. (+rep if you can tell me just what painting I got it from. [an actual link to the picture])

Step seven: Try over and over to get it to look right.

Step eight: Put in the white tie thing.

Step nine: Try and fail to add epaullete thingies.

Step dec: Take a female head texture, use the darken brush to add wrinkles.

Step el: Tweak the colors around until they look good.

Step doh: Make RCS pack and helmet for completion (Just in case she wants to oversee some admiraly things on a Starbase.)

Step dohone: Put the head and suit textures through the [Online Normal Map Generator](http://cpetry.github.io/NormalMap-Online/)

Step dohtwo: Make a how-to list in base-12.

Step dohthree: ...

Step dohfour: Profit!

I think it turned out pretty great in the comic. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Of course, credit goes to Kuzzter for pasting in the cool hat.

And, you're quite welcome, Kuzzter. I really enjoyed her reveal. I was reading it, saw "shurley" and thought "wait... hold on..." and then I saw her silhouette and was like "aww yeah!"

Admiral Shirley! What will she have to say about this mess? Surely she won't ignore our hero's plight!
